resources.string: Find My Phone By Clapping
Never lose your phone! Just clap twice and locate your device within seconds.
Customize the Tones, choose different Sounds, or even enable Vibration alerts.
Find Phone By Clap

Please enable permission from settings.Find My Phone By Clapping app needs permission to work properly click on settings and go to permission and allow permission.Find My Phone By Clapping is not collecting anytype of personal information.
